bibl.title: What's in a Name? The Gerontii of the Later Roman Empire.
bibl.note: Confronts the origin, derivation and significance, status, chronology, spatial distribution, corruptions and variant-forms of the name Gerontius. The spatial distribution of the Gerontii was Empire-wide, even if Egypt and Italy provide the bulk of the evidence. - Pp. 151-161: Appendix A. Eastern Gerontii (Nos 1-217).
bibl.seg: CHERF William J., What's in a Name? The Gerontii of the Later Roman Empire.

Confronts the origin, derivation and significance, status, chronology, spatial distribution, corruptions and variant-forms of the name Gerontius. The spatial distribution of the Gerontii was Empire-wide, even if Egypt and Italy provide the bulk of the evidence. - Pp. 151-161: Appendix A. Eastern Gerontii (Nos 1-217).
